original_text: While the servants were waiting outside the king's room, Ehud had escaped. He went past the stone idols, and he ran to Seirah.
korean_text: 그들이 기다리는 동안에 에훗이 피하여 돌 뜨는 곳을 지나 스이라로 도망하니라

sentences.original_text: While the servants were waiting outside the king's room
sentences.korean_translation: 종들이 왕의 방 밖에서 기다리는 동안

sentences.original_text: He went past the stone idols
